question: Which are the basin countries of the "Lempa River"?
explanation: El Salvador, Honduras and Guatemala are the basin countries of the "Lempa River". The Lempa River is a 422-kilometre long river in Central America. There are several hydroelectric dams along the river. In El Salvador, there is the Guayojo dam, the Cerron Grande Hydroelectric Dam, the "5 de Noviembre" dam, and the "15 de Septiembre" dam which can be easily seen from the Pan-American highway. The river forms a small part of the international boundary between El Salvador and Honduras.
